en.title: "Hope For Children" Contributes RM 50,000 to Desa Amal Jireh Charity Foundation!
en.content: FE's " Hope For Children " Charity program is proud to contribute RM 50,000 (RM 25,000 cash from "Hope For Children" and RM 25,000 to be raised by the recipient charity) to Tabung Kebajikan dan Pertubuhan Desa Amal Jireh. Receiving the mock cheque from FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee was Desa Amal Jireh Foundation's Chairman and Founder Rev Terrence Sinnadurai witnessed by FE's Presidential Director Paul Lee. Rev Terrence is impressed with FE's concept of social entrepreneurship where social workers and business entrepreneurs merge together as one using FE's global platform. Rev Terrence is keen to participate in the program to help his Foundation achieve financial independence.

meta.description: FusionExcel Hope For Children Charity program contributes RM 50,000 to Tabung Kebajikan dan Pertubuhan Desa Amal Jireh.
meta.keyword: Paul Ting, Hope For Children, KS Lee, Desa Amal Jireh Charity Foundation, Rev Terrence
